Don't judge this site by its "cover". We're going to learn the ins-and-outs of HTML and CSS by starting with this bare-bones structure, and coding our way to this...

And that's only the beginning. This site will be constantly evolving as a reflection of our skills. As we progress in our abilities, so shall this site exhibit new features and robust design layouts. Stick around for the ride- it'll be worth it.
